channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Two Israeli embassy aides killed. And, House passes Trump's 'big, beautiful bill'
item.description: Two staff members of Israel's embassy in Washington, D.C., were shot dead last night outside of a Jewish museum. And, House Republicans passed Preside...

item.title: South Africa's president praised for staying calm during Trump's Oval Office ambush
item.description: South Africa's President Cyril Ramaphosa keeps his cool after a carefully choreographed Oval Office ambush by Trump.

item.title: Scientists want to track the world's biodiversity using DNA in the air
item.description: Scientists have found a way to sample DNA out of the air on a large scale â€” making it possible to one day track the health and well being of all kinds...

item.title: Educators fear their homeless students could become a target for Trump cuts
item.description: A federal program provides extra help to make sure students experiencing homelessness get an education. Amid massive cuts to the federal government, t...

item.title: A Newark air traffic controller on how it felt when systems went dark
item.description: An air traffic controller who works the airspace around Newark, N.J. speaks out about what it was like to lose radar and communication systems during ...

item.title: Supreme Court won't allow nation's first religious charter school
Fact-checking Trump's Oval Office confrontation with Ramaphosa
item.description: President Trump made a series of claims about the killing of white farmers in South Africa, some of which are demonstrably false.

item.title: UN says 90 lorry loads of aid now in Gaza after three-day delay at crossing
item.description: The aid, including flour and baby food, was picked up three days after Israel eased an 11-week-long blockade.

item.title: House passes President Trump's massive budget bill after negotiations with GOP holdouts
item.description: The House narrowly passed President Trump's massive budget bill Thursday morning following an all-night session after days of negotiations. CBS News' ...

item.title: Small plane crashes into San Diego neighborhood, setting homes and vehicles on fire
item.description: A small plane crashed into a San Diego neighborhood, setting about 15 homes on fire as well as vehicles, and forcing evacuations along several blocks.

item.title: ICE agents wait in hallways of immigration court as Trump seeks to deliver on mass arrest pledge
Nike to raise US prices as firms face tariffs uncertainty
item.description: The US sportswear giant says its price increases are part of "seasonal planning".

item.title: Supreme Court tie vote dooms taxpayer funded Catholic charter school in Oklahoma
White crosses shown by Trump not graves, says man who erected them
item.description: The US president had said the crosses were evidence of attacks on white farmers in South Africa.

item.title: President Trump has tense exchange with South Africa's president in Oval Office meeting

item.title: What to know about President Trump's crypto dinner
item.description: President Trump will have dinner Thursday with the biggest backers of his private cryptocurrency. The top 25 holders are invited to a private VIP rece...

item.title: Why there's no tax break for Social Security benefits in the new tax bill
item.description: Seniors are unlikely to get a break on paying taxes on their Social Security benefits, an issue that impacts more people each year.

item.title: Top Maoist leader killed as India cracks down on rebels
item.description: Twenty-seven rebels are reported to have been killed in a gunfight with security forces in Chhattisgarh.
